articles.author: Gerrit De Vynck, Cat Zakrzewski
articles.title: FTC launches antitrust investigation into Microsoft as Biden era ends - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Federal Trade Commission sent a broad request to the tech giant asking for information on its cloud, software and AI businesses.
articles.content: The Federal Trade Commission has launched a broad antitrust investigation into Microsofts business empire a late-game shot at Big Tech from the Democratic-led agency in the final weeks of President J… [+3726 chars]

articles.title: Vega C return to flight slips a day - SpaceNews
articles.description: European officials say the Vega C rocket is ready for its return to flight next week despite a technical issue that will delay the launch of an Earth science satellite by at least a day.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON European officials say the Vega C rocket is ready for its return to flight next week despite a technical issue that will delay the launch of an Earth science satellite by at least a day.
